document.full_text: president mahmoud ahmadinejad remains iran's caretaker oil minister, despite a ruling by the constitutional watchdog that he had no legal right to the post, isna news wire reported a vice president saying on sunday.
document.title: ahmadinejad remains caretaker oil minister: aide
lines_and_colors: president mahmoud ahmadinejad remains iran's caretaker oil minister, despite a ruling by the constitutional watchdog that he had no legal right to the post, isna news wire reported a vice president saying on sunday.
